title: Draft/ranked preferences only work *some* of the time??
body:
I have been under the impression that draft/ranked queue will ONLY place you in your chosen role.  I often queue as bot/support and get placed as jungle (always jungle), sometimes several times in a row, after dodges.  This is really tilting because it's so unexpected.  I double checked my selected roles every time someone dodged, just because maybe I mistakenly chose incorrectly, but neither was jungle.

Have I misunderstood the way the system works?  Are they both just preferred roles, and you can still be stuck in any role?  

If so, why is this even a thing, and why is there a fill option if you're technically required to fill anyway...??

As a side note, I primarily play on the Japan server, and it is annoyingly neglected and outdated in many ways, so maybe that's relevant?  I'd still say it's something to be looked into, if this isn't an intentional outcome.

replies.body: Your preferred roles are not guaranteed if auto-fill is enabled, which happens if not enough players of a certain role around your tier are queuing up.  The only time you are truly guaranteed your preferred roles are if you're in your promos.  I hope that helps clear things up!

I really appreciate how quickly you guys get back to us on problems.  And thank you, that's really good to know.  I went back to a lot of earlier postings about it and couldn't find any details saying that, but it's entirely possible I just overlooked them.   

Is there a way to know when it's enabled?
Happy to help!  You'll see an icon for "auto-fill enabled" in the matchmaking lobby where you select your preferred roles!
